Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review replies from @Clinical Lead.
Organize the collected feedback from @EHR Vendor Liaison and @Clinical Lead to present findings.
Take a break and engage with personal interests.
Prepare presentation materials summarizing the findings and proposed changes.
Conduct a meeting with @Training Coordinator and @EHR Integration Developer to finalize details for the training sessions.
Follow up with @Quality Assurance Tester to review the effectiveness of the updated training materials.
Finalize any last-minute adjustments to the training materials based on correlation to findings.
Respond to any outstanding support tickets before ending the day.
